plugins.name: adaptive-learning
plugins.description: Observe tool usage patterns, learn instincts, and surface them at session start

plugins.name: doc-enforcer
plugins.description: PostToolUse hook that tracks code vs doc file edits and reminds when documentation may need updating

plugins.name: forced-eval
plugins.description: Force explicit evaluation of Skills, MCP Tools, and Agents before implementation (84% activation rate)

plugins.name: notifications
plugins.description: Push notifications via ntfy.sh for Claude events

plugins.name: qute-minimal
plugins.description: Essential Claude Code skills: commit messages, git worktrees, README generation, external LLM review

plugins.name: qute-quant
plugins.description: Quantitative finance, data science, and ML skills: paper reading, market data, SQL, scikit-learn, polars, statsmodels, plotly, and more

plugins.name: qute-webdev
plugins.description: Web development skills and agents: PDF processing, frontend design, code refactoring, PRD writing, security auditing

plugins.name: research-workflow
plugins.description: Research workflow for ML/data science: hypotheses, experiments, findings, paper reading

plugins.name: ruff-formatter
plugins.description: Auto-format and lint Python files with ruff after edits

plugins.name: session-persistence
plugins.description: Persist session state across Claude sessions — saves what you were working on and reports it on next start

plugins.name: skill-use-logger
plugins.description: Logs skill invocations to .claude/skill-use-log.jsonl for analytics

plugins.name: strategic-compact
plugins.description: Strategic context compaction — suggests /compact after threshold tool calls, provides /handoff for manual session transitions
